title: int64(int(2)*1024*1024*1024) result is a negative numberÔºÅwhy?
body:
by **feixings**: 
run code:
package main

import (
	"fmt"
)

func main() {
	i := int(2)
	j := int64(2)
	fmt.Println(int64(i * 1024 * 1024 * 1024))
	fmt.Println(int64(j * 1024 * 1024 * 1024))
	fmt.Println(int64(2 * 1024 * 1024 * 1024))
}

result:
-2147483648
2147483648
2147483648

I don't know why?
